In this vignette we test the sensitivity of the method by simulating with imports and making sure that they are found.

# Initialisation

```{r}
library(DetectImports)
library(ape)
set.seed(0)
```

# Simulation with a single import

```{r}
tree=simImports()
plot(tree,show.tip.label = F)
axisPhylo(backward = F)
```

# Detection of imports

```{r}
pvals=test1(tree,epsilon=1)
summary(pvals)
which(pvals<0.01)
```
